sourcesContent:
<main class="home-section">
    <mat-table [dataSource]="dataSource" class="table">
        <!-- User name Definition -->
        <ng-container matColumnDef="user">
          <mat-header-cell *matHeaderCellDef> User name </mat-header-cell>
          <mat-cell *matCellDef="let row"> {{row.user}} </mat-cell>
        </ng-container>
      
        <!-- Age Definition -->
        <ng-container matColumnDef="email">
          <mat-header-cell *matHeaderCellDef>Email</mat-header-cell>
          <mat-cell *matCellDef="let row"> {{row.email}} </mat-cell>
        </ng-container>
      
        <!-- Title Definition -->
        <ng-container matColumnDef="mobile">
          <mat-header-cell *matHeaderCellDef>Mobile</mat-header-cell>
          <mat-cell *matCellDef="let row"> {{row.mobile}} </mat-cell>
        </ng-container>

        <ng-container matColumnDef="action">
            <mat-header-cell *matHeaderCellDef>Action</mat-header-cell>
            <mat-cell *matCellDef="let row"> 
                <button (click)="editUser(row)" mat-icon-button color="primary">
                    <mat-icon>edit</mat-icon>
                </button>
                <button mat-icon-button color="primary">
                    <mat-icon>delete</mat-icon>
                </button>
            </mat-cell>
          </ng-container>
      
        <!-- Header and Row Declarations -->
        <mat-header-row *matHeaderRowDef="displayedColumns"></mat-header-row>
        <mat-row *matRowDef="let row; columns: displayedColumns"></mat-row>
      </mat-table>
      <mat-paginator [pageSizeOptions]="[5, 10, 20]"
      showFirstLastButtons
      aria-label="Select page of periodic elements">
    </mat-paginator>
</main>
